modernreaders.com/2015/04/astronomers-di.snippet: We broadened our search, and found the unexpected, Zolotukhin explained. These elliptical galaxies are already hard enough to find, but the two men found about 200 new compact ellipticals, with 11 of these classified as homeless or runaway galaxies.

sci-news.com/2015/04/astronomers-discove.snippet: Dr Igor Chilingarian of Harvard-Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics and his colleague, Dr Ivan Zolotukhin of the LInstitut de Recherche en Astrophysique et Planetologie in Toulouse, France, have discovered eleven runaway compact elliptical galaxies.

thespacereporter.com/2015/04/runaway-gal.title: Runaway galaxies ejected by galactic collisions...
thespacereporter.com/2015/04/runaway-gal.snippet: A recent survey identified 11 isolated, small compact elliptical galaxies. Past discoveries have revealed the existence of around two dozen runaway stars, rocketing out of their former homes at escape velocities of over a million miles per hour.
